duties_responsibilities.duty: Oversee all campus operations, including management of physical assets, staff recruitment, training, and direction.
Ensure compliance with accreditation standards, laws, and college policies, and meet financial goals.
Supervise all personnel, manage financial and physical resources, and maintain customer relationships.
Develop campus business objectives and budgets, and seek continuous improvement.
Cultivate strong, positive relationships with the community, employers, public agencies, and educational institutions.
Model the values and ethics of the College, ensure the same conduct in employees, and perform all other assigned duties.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree or equivalent education and work experience required. (Master's preferred)
Minimum of three years’ experience in private postsecondary education, previous supervisory experience preferred.
